channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report I-2024090054
item.description:
Report I-2024090054

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-27T09:15:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-22
  • City: Westbrook
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SAPPI NORTH AMERICA, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 8/22/24 around 12:30PM, the tank truck was leaving the facility following a delivery of E286A material. Upon backing out of the truck unloading bay, residual E286A material stuck to the back tire of the tank truck which resulted in applying a stain on the pavement leaving the property onto Warren Avenue before dissipating.
